mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GBOARD (GBNO, GNO, MEMBERID , TITLE, CONTENT, GBCATEID) VALUES (GBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gno}, #{memberid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gbcateid})
mapper.select: select MR.name, GC.GBCATENAME, TO_CHAR(GB.GBREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI AM') AS GBREGDATE, GB.TITLE, GB.CONTENT from GBOARD GB join GBCATE GC on GB.GBCATEID = GC.GBCATEID join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GB.MEMBERID;
